error.name: error
error.title: Error
error.description:
One of the following error codes:

- `requestFailed`: Thrown if the entire request failed due to e.g. CORS issues or no network connectivity.
- `serverError`: Thrown if the server returned an error response.
- `resourceNotFound`: Thrown if the resouce you are trying to get was not found.
- `unknown`: Thrown if an unknown error occurred while fetching the record.
- `responseMustBeObject`: Thrown if the server does not return an object as a response for a single data record request.

flows.func:
const { supersonic, contextId } = inputs;
await supersonic.api.spinner.hide(contextId);

arguments.name: text
arguments.title: Spinner text
arguments.description: Optional text label to show below the spinner. Subsequent calls to **Show spinner*** will update the text label, useful to e.g. show loading progress updates.

arguments.name: time
arguments.title: Time to wait
arguments.description: Time to wait as an integer. Negative values result in 0 delay.

arguments.name: unit
arguments.title: Unit
arguments.description: Unit of time to wait: `ms` for millisecond, `s` for second, `min` for minute and `h` for hour.
